title: Displaying Images in MDX
summary: Example of displaying images in MDX, using Next images and a custom layout grid.

body.raw:
See how to create a simple responsive image gallery using MDX and Next.js. Features images served using `next/image` component. The locally stored images are located in a folder with the following path: `/static/images/[filename].jpg` Since we are using mdx, we can create a simple responsive flexbox grid to display our images with a few tailwind css classes. --- # Gallery
![Image one](https://picsum.photos/800/400?random=1)
![Image two](https://picsum.photos/800/400?random=2)
![Image three](https://picsum.photos/800/400?random=3)
![Image four](https://picsum.photos/800/400?random=4)
# Implementation ```js

![Image two](https://picsum.photos/800/400?random=2)
![Image three](https://picsum.photos/800/400?random=3)
![Image four](https://picsum.photos/800/400?random=4)
